document.full_text: texas may still have problems like a multi-billion dollar budget deficit and public schools facing major spending cuts, but its legislature has moved to make the lone star state safe for "noodling."
document.title: texas legislature acts to make state safe for "noodling"
lines_and_colors: texas may still have problems like a multi-billion dollar budget deficit and public schools facing major spending cuts, but its legislature has moved to make the lone star state safe for "noodling."
